pr_title: Filter out Netty DEBUG level exceptions

timeline.bodyText: Should we include sun.misc.Unsafe too (I see some log messages in that class with this string)?
timeline.author: jaikiran

timeline.message:
Filter out Netty DEBUG level exceptions

We have had various reports about these so this
drops them to TRACE level.

Fixes #5213
